phrase.text: Greetings Iberian! I am Larax, the terror of Rome, blessed by the gods and hero of all Gaul!
Praise to the gods! I've finally found you, mighty Larax! I come to ask for your help to fight against Rome.
It will be a pleassure, Iberian!
My ship is at your complete disposal, Larax; will you help us expel those Roman dogs from our lands?
Bring me to the old Hispania, let's go!
